content:
We've now deployed the merged version of @Steve Howell's rebuild of our library code for the left and right sidebars to make keyboard navigation work better, clean up duplicated code, and hopefully also improve performance.

I encourage playing around with arrow key navigation after using the q/w hotkeys. Also, everyone should be on the lookout for new sidebar bugs :smiley:
Do we only show online/idle people now?
Yes! but we search for other too via w hotkey (or search icon).
Searching a unlisted person is working for me!
Oh wow arrow keys in those sidebars <3
